clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Cardiovascular Health, Nutrition and Frailty in Older Adults in Spain
clinical_study.official_title: Study on Cardiovascular Health, Nutrition and Frailty in Older Adults in Spain

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine the association between ideal cardiovascular health, diet and other lifestyles, biological risk factors, either well-established or emergent, and the risk of frailty in older adults, throughout different waves (2008-10, 2012 and 2015 -16).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Cardiovascular health
secondary_outcome.description: Method of assessment: 7 cardiovascular health metrics as defined by American Heart Association

study_pop.textblock: Community-living individuals in Spain aged 60 years or older.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Non-institutionalized Spanish resident
- 60 years and over
Exclusion Criteria:
